transcripts.text: Well I did have a question and I wonder what you guys think of because the whole like there's the denialism of sort of very specific types of social behavior that you usually associate with.  like sectarian cults now operate on the internet like purges and defamation um like things that normal people usually only ever experience if they were like in a sectarian cult or um or a religious cult.  now normal people get this like online on the internet all the time and it seems completely obvious.
